diff_hunk:
@@ -51,5 +53,32 @@ def get_lib():
   import tensorflow as tf
   return _os_path.join(_os_path.dirname(tf.__file__))
 
+
+def get_compile_flags():
+  """Get the compilation flags for custom operators.
+
+  Returns:
+    The compilation flags.
+  """
+  import tensorflow as tf
+  flags = []
+  flags.append('-I%s' % get_include())
body: These are gcc flags. It's not clear what to do on windows, since you can use MSVC and gcc-based compilers. I think we should assume MSVC-style flags on windows.
